reviews.author: Austin Williamson
reviews.review: Absolutely horrendous accommodations for students. Complete inflexibility and total managerial incompetence. After learning that I could not break my lease or transfer my lease to a third-party, the leasing office was barely tolerable

reviews.review:
Changed my initial review after having lived here for a year.

Absolutely horrible!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Nate, this is Kailey with Customer Service. I see you left similar feedback on multiple sites. We strive to offer outstanding service and value with every single interaction. We apologize if we missed the mark, but were always grateful  More

reviews.author: Sarah Taylor
reviews.review: Management is like a rotating door through here. You're guaranteed to see an entirely different crew of people by the time you finish your lease. The apartments are cheaply made and fall apart. Don't fall for their "bundle utilities"

reviews.author: Rachel Sandal
reviews.review: Management and staff have been rude and somewhat unresponsive to our needs/questions. People have entered our apartment without any notice at all and it was scary! That experience left my roommates and I shaken up. In talking to the leasing

reviews.author: K. M.
reviews.review:
Have to change my review.

Avoid at all costs. Management is a joke, repairs of serious nature are rarely

reviews.author: Cameron Smith
reviews.review: Overpriced and brittle apartments. Everything breaks apart, they charge you for every little thing and management lies to you. They provide absolutely no help with trying to move out and they pretend to care about residents. I hate living here and I have already recommended to several friends to STAY AWAY

ownerResponse.text: Hi Cameron, this is Kailey with Customer Service. We strive to offer outstanding service and value with every single interaction. We apologize if we missed the mark, but were always grateful for feedback  constructive and otherwise. We  More

reviews.author: Alex Jonees
reviews.review: Terrible.. the place is extremely old and out dated. A lot of the amenities break too.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback, Alex. We would love to address any maintenance issues you currently have. Please contact us at your earliest convenience!

reviews.author: Tiger Rabbit
reviews.review: terrible  management.  the floor makes super loud noise.  I literally can hear every movement my upper floor made.   I told the manager and staff in the office,  and no one give a f.

reviews.author: Ethan Marquardt
reviews.review: Too expensive for what the units have to offer. Look for better alternatives.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Ethan, this is Kailey from Customer Service. Thank you for the feedback. I am sorry to hear that we fell short of expectations. I have found that we priced fairly with the market, although I personally wish I didn't have to pay rent too!  More

reviews.author: Lauren S
reviews.review: An apartment is an apartment but this place is mediocre at best and horribly overpriced

ownerResponse.text: Hi Lauren, this is Kailey from Customer Service. I wish I could control the rental market prices but because we have such a strong market that is what dictates the pricing. Please feel free to call or email directly at 425-287-7438 or customerservice@plpinc.net if there is something more I could handle for you. Take care, Kailey
